name: Ghostbane
storyline: GHOSTBANE is a game where you act as Paranormal Hunters. Your mission is to identify and neutralize various types of ghosts appearing in different locations. You can try your luck alone, but it's better to work in teams of 2-4 people. Solve this paranormal world using your equipment. Identify the types and beliefs of ghosts. By doing so, you can perform a ritual and trap them. Remember, teamwork and utilizing the strengths of each team member will shape your success. Are you ready, hunters?
